bluecards.cardCaption: Oh no, your pet is sick. A trip to the vet
Your bike bas broken, you need to get it fixed
Your computer has a virus which needs fixed
You smashed the screen on your phone
Unexpected party tomorrow - of course you’re going!
You buy a gift for your friend’s birthday
You went for an eye test and found out you need glasses
You caught the flu and need some tablets
You lost your library book and now have a fine
You buy your tutor a 'thank you' gift
Too lazy to cook so you get a take away
Parking fine. Yellow lines mean no parking!
You’ve went over your phone contract this month, oops!
